turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a Starbucks drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande mocha latte with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on soldiers field road, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 7 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
